name: mbfdm2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: eqeltrrd(c0, cdm(cvol), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
stmt.pretty: eqeltrrd(c0, dom(vol), dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdm(cvol)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(vol))
⊣ (w0 → dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= c0)
⊣ (w0 → dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ dom(vol))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ dom(vol), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdm(cvol)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
-| wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdm(cvol)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ dom(vol))
⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn → dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ dom(vol))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(vol))
⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ d(s0, w0)
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn → dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ dom(vol))

comment: The domain of a measurable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2014.)
